commands.name: CPUP
commands.description: Returns the CPU usage as a percentage

commands.name: CPUPC
commands.description: Returns the amount of physical cores on the cpu

commands.name: CPULC
commands.description: Returns the amount of logical cores on the cpu

commands.name: CPUFB
commands.description: Returns the maximum frequency of the cpu

commands.name: CPUFB
commands.description: Returns the minimum frequency of the cpu

commands.name: CPUFB
commands.description: Returns the current frequency of the cpu

commands.name: MemP
commands.description: Returns the memory usage as a percentage

commands.name: DiskP
commands.description: Returns the disk usage as a percentage

commands.name: UserL
commands.description: Returns all users logged onto the computer
